data.title: 1922 Ad Silent Film In the Name of the Law R-C Picture - ORIGINAL SILE
data.meta_description: This is an original 1922 black and white print ad for the silent film "In the Name of the Law" starring Ben Alexander, Josephine Adair, Johnny Thompson, Jean Adair, Ralph Lewis, Claire McDowell, Ella Hall, Emory Johnson, Johnnie Walker, and Richard Morris, directed by Emory Johnson. An R-C Picture, distributed by Film
data.text:
This is an original 1922 black and white print ad for the silent film "In the Name of the Law" starring Ben Alexander, Josephine Adair, Johnny Thompson, Jean Adair, Ralph Lewis, Claire McDowell, Ella Hall, Emory Johnson, Johnnie Walker, and Richard Morris, directed by Emory Johnson. An R-C Picture, distributed by Film Booking Offices of America.

CONDITION

This 89+ year old Item is rated Very Fine. Light aging throughout. No creases. Some light surface rub. No tears. No water damage. Light pencil mark top left corner.

Product Type: Original Print Ad; Black & White / Grayscale

Grade: Very Fine

Dimensions: Approximately 8.5 x 12 inches; 22 x 30 cm

Authentication: Serial-Numbered Certificate of Authenticity w/ Full Provenance

Protection: Packaged in a custom archival sleeve with an acid-free black board (great for display, gift-giving, and preservation)

Keywords specific to this image: Vintage Advertising

SILENTA8B5C22
